newsitem.title: USA: Eastern Bancorp stake held by Bay Pond.
newsitem.headline: Eastern Bancorp stake held by Bay Pond.

text.p: Bay Pond Parthers L.P., said Thursday it holds a 5.10 percent stake in Eastern Bancorp or 187,300 common shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Bay Pond said its latest transactions include the purchase of 71,800 common shares between December 19 and January 2 at prices ranging from $22.875 to $23.125 per share.
Bay Pond said it holds the stake for investment purposes.
Eastern, based in Williston, Vt., is engaged in savings and loan operations primarily in mortgage and consumer banking.
